Reviews.Title: Not Bad for Price
Reviews.Author: GB
Reviews.Content: So the watch did pretty much everything I thought it would. Only issue was that a screw was stripped and we had to get that fixed after wearing it twice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof wrist watch mobile phone
GSM Quadband 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHZ unlocked
Bluetooth 2.0, FREE bluetooth headset in this package
Support MicroSD (TF) card, FREE 2GB card in this package
